N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-3.4 - General prohibitions

State Regulations

Construction and operation prohibited. No owner or
operator of a proposed major facility, NSR major modification, or existing
major facility which undertakes a significant modification but avoids NSR
applicability through netting, shall be allowed to begin actual construction, commence operation, or operate such new facility or modification, as
appropriate, without a permit which incorporates the requirements of this Part. This provision shall not affect any requirement under Part 201 of this Title
for an owner and/or operator to obtain a permit or permit modification prior to
beginning actual construction, commencing operation or operating a new or
modified facility. Notes
